name: Shasta Health
long_description:
Shasta Health enables physical therapists to go independent, so they can make 3X more than working for a traditional clinic clinic. Our AI agents automatically find patients, handle scheduling, and bill insurance so our PTs can focus on providing care.

Patients get a concierge in-home appointment that's fully covered by insurance instead of being stuck on endless waitlists. Experience the future of physical therapy today by booking an appointment at www.shasta.health
one_liner: Get physical therapy at home, covered by insurance
